spherical coordinates



SphericalCoordf

typedef float  SphericalCoordf[3];
type: C typedef
description: spherical coordinates - float
radial distance
polar angle(period PI)
azimuthal angle (period 2 PI)

SphericalCoordd

typedef double SphericalCoordd[3];
type: C typedef
description: spherical coordinates - double
radial distance
polar angle(period PI)
azimuthal angle (period 2 PI)

m_spherical_coord_setd

void m_spherical_coord_setd(double r, double polar, double azimuth, SphericalCoordd res);
type: C function
description: set spherical coord - double

m_spherical_to_cartesiand

void m_spherical_to_cartesiand(SphericalCoordd spherical, vec3d res);
type: C function
description: transform spherical coordinates to Cartesian (vec3)

m_cartesian_to_sphericald

void m_cartesian_to_sphericald(vec3d vec, SphericalCoordd res);
type: C function
description: transform Cartesian coordinates (vec3) to spherical

m_spherical_coord_setf

void m_spherical_coord_setf(float r, float polar, float azimuth, SphericalCoordf res);
type: C function
description: set spherical coord - float

m_spherical_to_cartesianf

void m_spherical_to_cartesianf(SphericalCoordf spherical, vec3f res);
type: C function
description: transform spherical coordinates to Cartesian (vec3)

m_cartesian_to_sphericalf

void m_cartesian_to_sphericalf(vec3f vec, SphericalCoordf res);
type: C function
description: transform Cartesian coordinates (vec3) to spherical
